mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.UPPER_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_LEVEL, A.ORDER_PATH FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID, UPPER_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, LEVEL MENU_LEVEL, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TO_CHAR(MENU_LEVEL, 'fm000') || MENU_ID, '/') ORDER_PATH FROM CM_MENU START WITH UPPER_MENU_ID = '90000' CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = UPPER_MENU_ID ) A WHERE A.MENU_ID <> '90000' ORDER BY A.ORDER_PATH
